description:
If you run SPDs and need a new set of cleats, this is what you want.

  • Includes screws and backer plates, just in case you need new hardware too
  • Single release cleats are great for experienced clipless riders. If you are new to SPDs, start on a multi-release cleat (SM-SH56) and save yourself a tip-over or two
  • Made from cold forged steel for improved durability
name: Shimano SM-SH51 Single-Release Cleats Assembly with Cleat Nuts
